description: A new variant of StopCrypt ransomware (aka STOP) was spotted in the wild, employing a multi-stage execution process that involves shellcodes to evade security tools. [...]
title: StopCrypt: Most widely distributed ransomware now evades detection

description: SIM swappers have adapted their attacks to steal a target's phone number by porting it into a new eSIM card, a digital SIM stored in a rewritable chip present on many recent smartphone models. [...]
title: SIM swappers hijacking phone numbers in eSIM attacks

description: SIM swappers have adapted their attacks to steal a target's phone number from an eSIM card, a rewritable SIM chip present on many recent smartphone models. [...]
title: SIM swappers now stealing phone numbers from eSIMs

description: Tech support companies Restoro and Reimage will pay $26 million to settle charges that they used scare tactics to trick their customers into paying for unnecessary computer repair services. [...]
title: Tech support firms Restoro, Reimage fined $26 million for scare tactics

description: Google will roll out a Safe Browsing update later this month that will provide real-time malware and phishing protection to all Chrome users, without compromising their browsing privacy. [...]
title: Google Chrome gets real-time phishing protection later this month

description: France Travail, formerly known as Pôle Emploi, is warning that hackers breached its systems and may leak or exploit personal details of an estimated 43 million individuals. [...]
title: French unemployment agency data breach impacts 43 million people

description: Nissan Oceania is warning of a data breach impacting 100,000 people after suffering a cyberattack in December 2023 that was claimed by the Akira ransomware operation. [...]
title: Nissan confirms ransomware attack exposed data of 100,000 people
